page.title: 06Pencombe Post Office.
page.content: The village Post Office and shop is run by Mrs.R.Chilman.This forms a valuable service to the village and surrounding area. The day starts with changing datestamp and organizing stock,cash,ordering stock for Post Office and shop. Through the day dealings are made with pensions,child benefit,savings bank,Giro payments and outpayments. Other services in Post Office are purchasing postage stamps,National Insurance,T.V.licence,telphone, vehicle licence and home help stamps. Postal orders,National Savings Certificates,television licences and Premium Bonds. The shop stocks many items,stationary,medicines,first aid, groceries,frozen food,sweets and gifts.
